_comment: [CI-LOCKED] The content of this file is locked. Contributions are welcome, but change validation may be delayed.
_ACCESS_KEY_ALT.comment: This is for screen reader for aria-keyshortcuts property.
_ACCESS_KEY_FOR_MAC_ALT.comment: This is for screen reader for aria-keyshortcuts property on a Mac.
_ACTIVITY_BOT_SAID_ALT.comment: This is for screen reader only. $1 is the initials for the bot (e.g. "JD").
_ACTIVITY_YOU_SAID_ALT.comment: This is for screen reader only.
_ACTIVITY_BOT_ATTACHED_ALT.comment: This is for screen reader and is narrated before each attachments sent by the bot.
ACTIVITY_INTERACTIVE_LABEL_ALT: Message is interactive. Click to interact.
_ACTIVITY_INTERACTIVE_LABEL_ALT.comment: This is for screen reader. When the user is navigating to one of the message with interactive elements (no links), it will give this hint.
ACTIVITY_INTERACTIVE_WITH_LINKS_LABEL_AL: One or more links in the message. Click to interact.
_ACTIVITY_INTERACTIVE_WITH_LINKS_LABEL_A: This is for screen reader. When the user is navigating to one of the message containing links, it will give this hint.
_ACTIVITY_YOU_ATTACHED_ALT.comment: This is for screen reader and is narrated before each attachments sent by the user.
_ACTIVITY_NUM_ATTACHMENTS_ONE_ALT.commen: This is for screen reader and only narrated when the message arrive. The narration when the message arrive, could be "Bot WC said: Hello, World! 1 attachment. Sent at 2020-01-02 12:34 PM.". This is for plural rule of "one".
_ACTIVITY_NUM_ATTACHMENTS_FEW_ALT.commen: $1 is the number of attachments. This is for plural rule of "few".
_ACTIVITY_NUM_ATTACHMENTS_MANY_ALT.comme: $1 is the number of attachments. This is for plural rule of "many".
_ACTIVITY_NUM_ATTACHMENTS_OTHER_ALT.comm: $1 is the number of attachments. This is for plural rule of "other".
_ACTIVITY_NUM_ATTACHMENTS_TWO_ALT.commen: $1 is the number of attachments. This is for plural rule of "two".
_ACTIVITY_STATUS_SEND_FAILED_RETRY.comme: This is Markdown. Do not localize "[RETRY]" (the one in uppercase).
_ACTIVITY_STATUS_SEND_STATUS_ALT_SENT_AT: $1 is the time when the message is successfully sent, in absolute format, e.g. 12:34 PM.
_ACTIVITY_STATUS_SEND_STATUS_ALT.comment: This is for screen reader. $1 will be one of "ACTIVITY_STATUS_SEND_STATUS_ALT_*".
_ATTACHMENT_CARD.comment: $1 is the title of the card. $2 is the subtitle. $3 is the text content.
_CAROUSEL_FLIPPER_LEFT_ALT.comment: This is for screen reader for the label of the left flipper button for carousels.
_CAROUSEL_FLIPPER_RIGHT_ALT.comment: This is for screen reader for the label of the right flipper button for carousels.
CONNECTIVITY_STATUS_ALT_RENDER_ERROR: Render error. Please check the console or contact the bot developer.
CONNECTIVITY_STATUS_ALT_SLOW_CONNECTION: Taking longer than usual to connect.
_CONNECTIVITY_STATUS_ALT.comment: This is for screen reader. $1 will be one of "CONNECTIVITY_STATUS_ALT_"*.
_FILE_CONTENT_ALT.comment: $1 is the name of the file, e.g. document.docx. $2 is the file size, e.g. 12 MB
KEYBOARD_HELP_CHAT_HISTORY_MOVE_BETWEEN_: Move between items in a message

Arrow up key
Arrow down key
KEYBOARD_HELP_CHAT_WINDOW_BODY_MOVE_BETW: Move between items in the chat window
MARKDOWN_EXTERNAL_LINK_ALT: Opens in a new window; external.
_MARKDOWN_EXTERNAL_LINK_ALT.comment: This is for the screen reader and is added to the label of the hyperlink. When clicked, the hyperlink will open in a new tab or window.
_SPEECH_INPUT_MICROPHONE_BUTTON_CLOSE_AL: This is for screen reader and is the label of the microphone button, when clicked, will close microphone.
_SPEECH_INPUT_MICROPHONE_BUTTON_OPEN_ALT: This is for screen reader and is the label of the microphone button, when clicked, will open microphone.
_SUGGESTED_ACTIONS_ALT.comment: This is for screen reader. $1 will be one of "SUGGESTED_ACTIONS_ALT_*".
_TEXT_INPUT_ALT.comment: This is for screen reader for the label of the message input box.
TOAST_ACCORDION_FEW: $1 Notifications: Click here to see details
_TOAST_ACCORDION_FEW.comment: $1 is the number of notifications. This is for plural rule of "few".
TOAST_ACCORDION_MANY: $1 Notifications: Click here to see details
_TOAST_ACCORDION_MANY.comment: $1 is the number of notifications. This is for plural rule of "many".
TOAST_ACCORDION_OTHER: $1 Notifications: Click here to see details
_TOAST_ACCORDION_OTHER.comment: $1 is the number of notifications. This is for plural rule of "other".
TOAST_ACCORDION_TWO: $1 Notifications: Click here to see details
_TOAST_ACCORDION_TWO.comment: $1 is the number of notifications. This is for plural rule of "two".
_TOAST_TITLE_ALT.comment: This is for screen reader. The label for individiual notification.
TRANSCRIPT_ARIA_LABEL_ALT: Chat history, press arrow keys to navigate.
_TRANSCRIPT_ARIA_LABEL_ALT.comment: This is for screen reader for the label that will be narrated when the chat history is focused.
_TRANSCRIPT_ARIA_ROLE_ALT.comment: This is for screen reader for the aria-roledescription of the chat history container.
TRANSCRIPT_LIVE_REGION_INTERACTIVE_LABEL: Message is interactive. Press shift tab key 2 to 3 times to switch to the chat history. Then click on the message to interact.
_TRANSCRIPT_LIVE_REGION_INTERACTIVE_LABE: This is for screen reader. When one or more activities arrived with interactive elements (no links) attached, the chat history (live region) will give this hint.
TRANSCRIPT_LIVE_REGION_INTERACTIVE_WITH_: One or more links in the message. Press shift tab key 2 to 3 times to switch to the chat history. Then click on the message to interact.
_TRANSCRIPT_LIVE_REGION_INTERACTIVE_WITH: This is for screen reader. When one or more activities arrived with links attached, the chat history (live region) will give this hint.
_TYPING_INDICATOR_SINGLE_TEXT.comment: This shows when a single user is typing.
_TYPING_INDICATOR_MULTIPLE_TEXT.comment: This shows when two or more users are typing simultaneously.
